thread.title: PM challenged to take up ex-MACC chief's call against graft
thread.title_full: PM challenged to take up ex-MACC chief's call against graft

title: PM challenged to take up ex-MACC chief's call against graft
text:
More 
Prime Minister Najib Razak has been challenged to heed former Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) chief Abu Kassim Mohamed's call for Malaysians to stand united against corruption regardless of political affiliations. 
Gelang Patah MP Lim Kit Siang said Najib and his cabinet can do so by accepting the invitation to attend the 'Save Malaysia' roundtable conference next week.
